data.description: Detect large executed perp orders (USD threshold).
data.script:
buyVol = source(vbuy, type=perp)
sellVol = source(vsell, type=perp)

p = $price.close

buyUsd = buyVol * p
sellUsd = sellVol * p

threshold = options.threshold

bigBuy = buyUsd >= threshold ? buyUsd : 0
bigSell = sellUsd >= threshold ? -sellUsd : 0

line(bigBuy, title=BigBuy, color="#00C853")
line(bigSell, title=BigSell, color="#D50000")
